attributes.action: Raise the minimum age for drivers to 21.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would have a three-fold benefit by
1, Increasing the number of people using public transport (helping to improve services)
2, Getting cars off the road (many of which are poorly maintained)
3, Reducing accidents, as surveys show that a higher number of accidents are caused by under 21s' than any other age bracket
